byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and KEVIN ROOSE

abstract: Moody's and Fitch cut their ratings on the commodities and derivatives firm, which is trying to sell part or all of itself.
snippet: Moody's and Fitch cut their ratings on the commodities and derivatives firm, which is trying to sell part or all of itself.

headline.main: MF Global Fights to Stay Afloat After Two Credit Downgrades
headline.print_headline: MF Global Fights to Stay Afloat Amid Multiple Credit Downgrades
